title: Placard
description:
A sign on a post, commonly used to promote ideas, causes, or make announcements. Often used used in the context of politics to represent a lawn sign or a poster brought to a protest. Also seen in commercial advertising.

Shown with indiscernible writing or not writing at all, this emoji is flexible in its use. WhatsApp shows a peace sign, which tilts the meaning away from commercial use.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the placard emoji presents as a crisp, white rectangular sign with subtly rounded corners, embodying Apple's signature clean and modern aesthetic.  Its slightly raised appearance and soft, diffused shadow suggest itâ€™s ready to display important information or announcements, conveying a sense of official communication or a clear directive within digital conversations.
